hoots.message: The stock market is showing significant gains today, reaching new all-time highs. Bullish trends ahead!
I can't wait for Drake to drop his new album!
The Knicks are totally going to lose this season
I just ate some lasagna for breakfast!
Intel's new 14th Gen processors are set to launch a couple of months from now! I can't wait!
The new steakhouse down the road is serving elephant steaks!
Biologists have discovered that certain reptiles can grow a third leg
I had a dream the Statue of Liberty came to life!
